columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the address record.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary address line in the local language (typically street name and number).

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line (apartment, suite, building) in the local language.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line often containing locality/city and postal code in the local language.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Country name value in the local language.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate (projected or raw) for this address record.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate (projected or raw) for this address record.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Code indicating the type/method of geocoding applied (enumerated value).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding/model used to produce geodata for the address.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Datetime when the geocoding/search was performed for this record.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Confidence or quality score assigned by the geocoder for this address match (higher = better).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier of the primary matched street from the geocoding model (external street ID).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier of a secondary matched street from the geocoding model (if applicable).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Geocoding model location identifier (e.g., locality or area code assigned by the geo model).

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code returned by the geocoding model (stored as text).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key reference to the Country table (dbo.Country.ID). Identifies country by numeric id.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string sent to the geocoding engine (usually concatenated address components). Useful for debugging or re-search.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number component identified by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street text returned by the geocoding model when present (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Secondary street number returned by the geocoding model when present.

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or city name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value as returned by the geocoding model (stored as text/varchar).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value as returned by the geocoding model (stored as text/varchar).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: String of hierarchical area codes or region codes associated with the geocoded location (space-separated codes).

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code stored as numeric type (integer).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: Administrative district or prefecture name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Identifier used by an external data mart or source system to link this address to other records.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart or source table that provided or referenced this address record.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from the source/data mart if available (alternative key).

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code indicating geocoding classification (e.g., L = locality, N = number/street).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1 value was manually overridden by a user (True/False).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary address line translated or transliterated to English (street name and number).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line in English (apartment, suite, or additional info).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line in English, often containing city/locality and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Country name in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Street name text as returned by the geocoding model, in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street text returned by the geocoding model in English (if present).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality/city name returned by the geocoding model, in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: Administrative district or prefecture name returned by the geocoding model, translated to English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model, in English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1En value was manually overridden by a user (True/False).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number component returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Secondary street number returned by the geocoding model in English (if present).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank record.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable bank name or description (may be localized).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the bank is currently active/enabled.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate integer identifier for the company (unique).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric company code used for identification (e.g., '001', '003').

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Full legal name of the company (human-readable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key referencing an external data-mart entity (currently null for all sample rows).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data-mart table associated with this company (mostly empty in current data).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external data-mart linkage (string key, often null).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the company is active (True/False).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Unique name/key of the configuration parameter (used to look up parameter values).

columns.name: Parameter
columns.description: Value for the configuration parameter. Values are stored as text and may contain single values or comma-separated lists.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key linking this configuration entry to an external data-mart record (typically null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external data-mart table associated with this configuration entry (mostly empty in current data).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key used for external data-mart linkage for this configuration entry (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the contact record.

columns.name: ContactAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the related Address record (dbo.Address.ID). May be null when no address is associated.

columns.name: Firstname
columns.description: Contact's first or given name. Frequently null in this dataset.

columns.name: Lastname
columns.description: Contact's last or family name. Used as the primary display label for contacts.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website or URL associated with the contact (e.g., company or personal site).

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes about the contact.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the contact record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: System user or process that created the contact record (e.g., datamigration).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the contact record was last modified. Often null for unmodified rows.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or process that last modified the contact record. Frequently null in this dataset.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Integer code representing contact's title or honorific (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Dr). Stored as numeric code.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data migration key linking this row to an external data-migration source or legacy system.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/legacy table used during data migration (e.g., CM19R_BranchUrls).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the source/migration system. Often null in this dataset.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the country record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short country code (e.g., GR, CY). Useful for lookups and integrations.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Country name in the local language. Used as the primary display label for countries.

columns.name: CountryTelephoneCode
columns.description: International telephone dialing code for the country (e.g., 0030).

columns.name: TaxNumberCode
columns.description: Country code used for tax number formatting or VAT identification (e.g., EL, CY).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-migration key linking this row to a legacy or external source.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table used during data migration for this country row.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the migration source system. Often null.

columns.name: MinLongitude
columns.description: Minimum longitude value for the country's bounding box or spatial extent.

columns.name: MinLatitude
columns.description: Minimum latitude value for the country's bounding box or spatial extent.

columns.name: MaxLongitude
columns.description: Maximum longitude value for the country's bounding box or spatial extent.

columns.name: MaxLatitude
columns.description: Maximum latitude value for the country's bounding box or spatial extent.

columns.name: DescriptionEn
columns.description: Country name in English. Helpful for international-facing displays and lookups.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key — unique identifier for the credit card type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the credit card type (for example: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the credit card type is active and may be used in transactions.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key — unique identifier for the GL sequence code record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Structured general ledger code (dot-separated) used to classify ledger entries (e.g., 30.00.00.0000).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Readable description of the GL sequence code (often localized text). Used as the primary human label for the code.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key intended to link this code to an external data mart or dimension table. Samples show NULL values.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table referenced by DMKey. Samples show no value (NULL) currently.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key for linking to external systems or dimensions. Samples indicate this is not populated.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the GL sequence code is active and should be considered in processing and reporting.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the KEPYO status entry.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code representing the status category (small enumerated set).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the status (stored in Greek collation).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key linking to an external/data model table (often null in this dataset).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/data model table associated with DMKey (uses Greek collation).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for linking to an external/data model entity (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this status is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the legal form.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Text description or abbreviation of the legal form (company legal type), stored in Greek collation.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key mapping this legal form to an external data model (many values populated).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data model table most often used for lookups (e.g., CM11D_CompanyLegalForms).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for mapping to external/data model entries (rarely populated).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the medium record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code used to identify the medium (business/system code).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human readable name of the medium (e.g., directory or publication name).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description or notes about the medium.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the medium record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the medium record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to the medium record (may be null if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account that last modified the medium record (may be null if never modified).

columns.name: GeographicalDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the geographical definition for this medium (references dbo.GeographicalDefinition.ID).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the medium is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: MediumKindID
columns.description: Foreign key to the medium kind/category (references dbo.MediumKind.ID).

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to the medium type (e.g., Print, Internet) (references dbo.MediumType.ID).

columns.name: CompanyID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the company that owns or is associated with the medium (references dbo.Company.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart integer key - reserved for integration with the data mart (mostly null in source).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data mart table name associated with this record (reserved for integration; often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Data mart character key used for integration (often null in source).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the medium type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human readable description of the medium type (e.g., Directory Assistant, Internet, Print).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart integer key placeholder for the medium type (mostly null in source).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data mart table name placeholder for this medium type (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Data mart character key placeholder for medium type integration (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the master heading (primary key). Integer surrogate key used to reference a heading.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Alphanumeric code assigned to the heading (may be null for some rows). Often used for external classification or legacy mapping.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Primary human-readable description of the heading (typically Greek). This is the main display label for a heading.

columns.name: ParentHeadingID
columns.description: Reference to the parent heading's ID (self-referential foreign key). Null when the heading is a top-level node.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key indicating the source or mapping group used during data migration or ETL processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset that the heading was migrated from or is associated with (ETL provenance).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the source system used for mapping; currently empty for most rows.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the heading is active (True) or inactive (False). Used to filter current/valid headings.

columns.name: DescriptionEN
columns.description: Optional English translation of the heading description. Many rows are null; used where English label is available.

columns.name: IsThematicModule
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the heading belongs to a thematic module. True when the heading is part of a thematic set.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the master section (primary key). Numeric identifier used to reference a section.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the section (often in Greek). This is the primary display label for a section.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used for ETL or source mapping; currently null for this table in available samples.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset associated with this section for provenance; currently empty in samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the source system used for mapping sections; typically null in this dataset.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the section is active (True) or inactive (False). Use to filter current/valid sections.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the product record; unique identifier for each product row.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code for the product (often used as SKU or internal code).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable product name displayed to users and used as the primary label for the product.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text explaining the product, features or bundle details.

columns.name: IsComposite
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product is a composite/bundle made up of multiple parts.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the product record was created in the system.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Name or identifier of the user or system process that created the product record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to the product record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Name or identifier of the user or process that last modified the product record.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the ProductType table; categorizes the product into a higher-level type.

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a discount or pricing policy applicable to this product (may be null).

columns.name: MinMembers
columns.description: Minimum number of members required for this product (for bundles or group offers).

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum number of members allowed for this product (for bundles or group offers).

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type of target value used for this product (semantic meaning defined elsewhere).

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Reference to a target value entity (e.g., ProductPart) used by this product; often null in this dataset.

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Flag indicating whether optional members/lines are allowed in this product bundle.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag that indicates if the product is dependent on another product or context.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag; true when the product is logically deleted and should not be shown in active lists.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Reference to the Udac entity (domain-specific classification or organizational unit).

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Identifier linking this product to a specific medium/version record (e.g., channel or media version).

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to a planning group used by canvas/planning workflows; frequently null.

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Numeric characterization or ranking of product features used for internal classification.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy/data‑model key used for integration with downstream or legacy data mart processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the legacy/data mart table associated with this product (used for ETL mapping).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the data mart or legacy integration layer for grouping or partitioning.

columns.name: NameCIAI
columns.description: Variant of the product name stored with case- and accent-insensitive collation to support searches and comparisons.

columns.name: CodeCIAI
columns.description: Variant of the product code stored with case- and accent-insensitive collation to support searches and comparisons.

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Feature flag indicating whether the line editor is enabled for this product in the UI.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of permitted edits/changes for the product; default is often zero.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validation rules should be applied to this product during business processes.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag controlling whether automated keyphrase creation is enabled for this product.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Indicates if the product supports multiple price ranges or tiered pricing.

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product's amounts should be excluded from budget calculations.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the product type; unique identifier for each product type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the product type used to categorize products (often displayed to users).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy/data mart key for integration or ETL processes; frequently null in this table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the legacy/data mart table associated with this product type (mainly used for ETL mapping).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the data mart or legacy integration layer for this product type (typically null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the pricelist item.

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Foreign key to VersionSection.ID — identifies the pricelist version section this item belongs to.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Foreign key to Product.ID — the product associated with this pricelist item.

columns.name: ApplyToSection
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this pricelist item applies at the section level.

columns.name: ApplyToSubSection
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this pricelist item applies to subsections.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used by downstream data marts or reporting integrations (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart/reporting table associated with this record (typically null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mart usage or external integration mapping (typically null).

columns.name: IsInactive
columns.description: Optional flag indicating whether the pricelist item is inactive (true) or active (false/null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the pricelist item detail record.

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Foreign key to PricelistItem.ID — identifies the parent pricelist item for this detail row.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Foreign key to Product.ID — the product for this detail row.

columns.name: ProductPartID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to ProductPart.ID — identifies a specific part/variant of the product when applicable.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to ProductKit.ID — references a product kit when this detail describes a kit component (often null).

columns.name: MeasurementType
columns.description: Foreign key to PriceListMeasurementType.ID — indicates the measurement or pricing unit type for this detail row.

columns.name: UnitAmount
columns.description: Monetary unit amount/price for this detail row. Unit: USD (per stats unit_hint).

columns.name: ComplexPrice
columns.description: Optional textual representation of complex pricing rules or formulas for this detail row (often empty).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used by data marts or external reporting systems (commonly null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart/reporting table for this detail record (commonly null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mart mapping or external integrations (commonly null).

columns.name: AllowableQuantities
columns.description: Optional list or specification (text) of allowable quantities for which this price applies (often null).

columns.name: AmountsPerAllowableQuantities
columns.description: Optional textual mapping of amounts corresponding to the AllowableQuantities field (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique integer identifier for the role.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the role (may contain localized text).

columns.name: Permissions
columns.description: Serialized permissions bitmap or string that encodes allowed actions and access for this role.

columns.name: MaxDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount amount allowed for users in this role (decimal, currency USD in samples).

columns.name: DiscountIsFixedAmount
columns.description: Flag indicating whether MaxDiscount is a fixed monetary amount (true) or a percentage/other scheme (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration or data-mart numeric key. Mostly null in current data; retained for downstream mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Integration or data-mart table name for mapping. Often null in current data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Integration or data-mart character key for mapping. Often null in current data.

columns.name: ForwardFromContractChange
columns.description: Flag indicating whether items or notifications should be forwarded when a contract changes.

columns.name: ForwardInternalProduct
columns.description: Flag controlling whether internal product changes are forwarded to related workflows or systems.

columns.name: ForwardTicketType
columns.description: Flag indicating whether ticket-type related changes should be forwarded.

columns.name: LoginUrl
columns.description: Optional role-specific login or landing page URL (may contain template tokens such as @userid).

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Reference to a parent role (self-referential foreign key to Role.ID), used to model role hierarchy.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the role is currently active and should be available for assignment.

columns.name: InboxViewType
columns.description: Numeric code specifying the inbox view variant presented to users with this role.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Unique code that identifies this sequence generator (primary key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of what this sequence generator is used for.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Current numeric value of the sequence (incrementing counter managed by the generator).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration/data-mart numeric key for mapping sequences to external systems (optional).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Integration/data-mart table name used for mapping or exporting sequence information (optional).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Integration/data-mart character key used for mapping or exporting sequence information (optional).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the TaxCode table. Uniquely identifies this tax code record. Also used as a foreign key reference to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID (maps this tax code to a business point / branch).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Country.ID. Identifies the country context for this tax code (all sample rows indicate a single country).

columns.name: TaxCode
columns.description: The official tax identification code/number associated with the business point. Stored as a padded string (NVARCHAR) and typically used as the primary human-readable identifier for tax lookup.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used for dimension mapping to an external dimension table (indicated by DMTable). Many rows are null — when present it points to a dimension record (e.g., branch mapping).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimension table that DMKey refers to (e.g., CM15E_Branches). Provides context for interpreting DMKey and linking to descriptive metadata.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key for dimension mapping. Presently sample data shows this column is empty for all rows; reserved for string keys when needed.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the TaxOffice table. Uniquely identifies a tax office record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code identifier for the tax office (e.g., '1100'). Often used for lookups, filtering and code-based integrations.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the tax office (text in Greek in sample data). This is the primary display label for the tax office.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Dimension mapping key used to link this tax office to dimensional metadata (e.g., entries in CM13D_TaxOffices). Mostly populated and used for cross-referencing.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimension table for DMKey (e.g., CM13D_TaxOffices). Indicates where to find descriptive or hierarchical metadata for this DMKey.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for dimension mapping. Sample data shows this column is currently not used (null).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the tax office is active (True) or inactive (False). Useful for filtering out deprecated offices.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the unit (unique identifier).

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Optional reference to the parent entity (hierarchy). Links this unit to a parent record in CanvasPlanningHistory or other parent tables.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the unit (used as the display label).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the unit record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or process that created the unit record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the unit record was last modified (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the unit record (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the unit is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to the channel type table; categorizes the unit by channel.

columns.name: LeftIndex
columns.description: Left index used for nested-set representation of the unit hierarchy.

columns.name: RightIndex
columns.description: Right index used for nested-set representation of the unit hierarchy.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional key used by data migration or integration processes to link records to external systems.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source table used during data migration or integration (e.g., '#units', 'DataMigration').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data migration mapping (nullable; reserved for external integration identifiers).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the user (unique identifier).

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Unique login name or account identifier for the user (display label).

columns.name: Password
columns.description: Hashed password or credential stored for the user (sensitive).

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: User's given (first) name.

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: User's family (last) name.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the user account was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created this user record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the user record was last modified (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified this user record (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the user account is active (True) or disabled/inactive (False).

columns.name: UnitID
columns.description: Foreign key linking the user to their associated unit (organizational unit or team).

columns.name: SalesCode
columns.description: Optional sales code assigned to the user (used in sales/CRM contexts).

columns.name: IsUnitManager
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the user is a manager of their assigned unit.

columns.name: SalesTeleCode
columns.description: Optional short code used for tele-sales routing (rarely populated).

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes associated with the user record.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional key used by data migration or integration processes to map this user to an external system.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source table used during data migration or integration for this user.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key used for data migration mapping (nullable; reserved for external identifiers).

columns.name: StopSales
columns.description: Flag indicating if the user is blocked from making sales (business-specific).

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Optional contact phone number for the user (may be null or empty).

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Optional email address for the user (used for notifications and login recovery).

columns.name: IsPaused
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the user's account is paused (business-specific state).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this bank deposit record. Note: this column is also used as a reference to SalesCollection.ID in the source system.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Foreign key to the Bank table (dbo.Bank.ID). Identifies the bank where the deposit was made.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Human-readable deposit reference or number assigned by the bank or system (may include characters from Greek collation). This is the preferred label for display and search.

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the deposit was recorded or posted to the bank. Used for sorting and time-based reporting.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the VAT category.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code representing the VAT category or regime. Useful for lookups and sorting.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: User-facing name or description of the VAT category (stored with Greek collation). This is the most human-readable column.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking to an external data model or legacy domain mapping table (GL04D_VatRegimes). Often null for unmapped categories.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data model table used for mapping (e.g., GL04D_VatRegimes). Nullable when no external mapping exists.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to an external data model; appears unused (all values null) in current samples.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this VAT category is active and should be available for selection in business processes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the bank deposit detail record; also references SalesCollection.ID in the source system.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Bank table (dbo.Bank.ID); identifies which bank is associated with this deposit.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Human-readable bank deposit number or reference code assigned by the bank or system (may include non-Latin characters).

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date and time when the bank deposit was recorded or posted.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the payment method type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Text description or display name of the payment method type (may contain localized/non-Latin text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment method type is currently active and available for use.

columns.name: InstallmentSequence
columns.description: Comma-separated list describing allowed installment counts or sequence (e.g., '1,2,3,4'). May be null for single-payment methods.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentPermited
columns.description: Flag indicating whether advance payments are permitted for this payment method type.

columns.name: PaymentWay
columns.description: Numeric code representing the general payment way or category (e.g., online, offline, card). Refer to business domain values for mapping.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for downstream data-mapping integrations. Often null in the source data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the mapping table used by integration processes (e.g., DPS2YPSPaymentMethodTypeMapping). Frequently null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for mapping integrations; typically not populated in the source dataset.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentAvailable
columns.description: Flag indicating whether advanced (prepaid) payment option is available for this payment method type.

columns.name: SubscriptionPaymentMethodTypeId
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing another PaymentMethodType record used for subscription-related mapping; can be null when not applicable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the credit card installment record; uniquely identifies an installment entry.

columns.name: Number
columns.description: Ordinal installment number (e.g., 1, 2, 3) indicating the position of this installment in a payment plan.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this installment option is active (true) or inactive (false) for selection.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the payment method record; uniquely identifies a configured payment option.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to PaymentMethodType indicating the type/category of this payment method (e.g., credit card, direct debit). References dbo.PaymentMethodType(ID).

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments configured for this payment method. Typically the count of payments to split the amount into.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval value (in days or defined units) between installments; indicates frequency of installment payments.

columns.name: PaymentMonth
columns.description: Optional scheduled month/date for payment. Field is nullable and may be empty for methods without a defined payment month.

columns.name: AdvancedPayment
columns.description: Monetary amount captured as an advanced payment for this method (decimal with precision). Typically zero when no advance payment is required.

columns.name: IsExchangeSale
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment method record is associated with an exchange sale (true) or not (false).

columns.name: PaymentPhoneAccount
columns.description: Optional phone account identifier or display value associated with the payment method (string). May be empty or null for most records.

columns.name: PaymentPhoneID
columns.description: Foreign key reference to a phone point/contact used for payment communications. References dbo.PointPhone(ID). Nullable when no phone is associated.

columns.name: PaymentCreditTransactionCode
columns.description: Optional external transaction code returned by a credit/payment gateway. Typically null in the current dataset.

columns.name: BillingEmailID
columns.description: Foreign key to the contact email record used for billing. References dbo.ContactEmail(ID). Nullable when no billing email is configured.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices associated with this payment method configuration (numeric count).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Identifier used for data migration processes to link back to source/migrated records. Not typically used in business logic.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table used during data migration (for tracing imported records). Contains values like 'DataMigration' or 'CT07R_ContractPayment'.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used during data migration for legacy identifiers; nullable in the current dataset.

columns.name: UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the payment month was explicitly specified by a user (true) or left to default/system (false).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the internal product record

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the product type (links to dbo.InternalProductType.ID)

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the product record was created

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User name of the person or system account that created the record

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mapping integer key used for external/legacy data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/legacy table used for data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for external/legacy data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product type

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or name for the product type (human readable label)

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer, human-readable description of the product type

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the product type is active (true) or inactive (false)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mapping integer key used for external/legacy data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/legacy table used for data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for external/legacy data mapping (nullable)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for this content attribute definition.

columns.name: ProductPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the product part definition that this attribute belongs to (dbo.ProductPartDefinition.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human readable name of the attribute (e.g., Customer Name, Address, Phone). Used as the primary display label for this definition.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Integer code indicating the data type or control type of the attribute (mapping to application-defined type enumeration).

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a value for this attribute is required (True) or optional (False).

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value to populate when no explicit value is provided for this attribute. Often empty for most attributes.

columns.name: MinValue
columns.description: Minimum numeric value allowed for this attribute when applicable; null when not used.

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value allowed for this attribute when applicable; null when not used.

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Flag indicating if the attribute is read-only (True) and cannot be edited in the UI or import processes.

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: Visibility mask/bitmask (stored as a short char code) controlling where and to whom the attribute is visible in different contexts.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Auxiliary integer used for data migration or grouping; often contains a constant value for this dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or staging table used during migration or data management processes (e.g., 'Migration').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for migration or external mapping; typically null in this dataset.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Numeric order used to determine sequence when attributes are rendered or filled; lower numbers render earlier.

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum allowed length (number of characters) for string values of this attribute; 0 often indicates no specific limit defined here.

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: When the attribute uses a lookup list, this holds the lookup table name. Null when the attribute has no lookup.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validation rules should be applied to this attribute's values.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Indicates if keyphrase generation/creation is enabled for this attribute (used for search or tagging).

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Optional filter expression applied to the lookup list for this attribute. Null when no filter is defined.

columns.name: DDLLookupFiltered
columns.description: Optional filter expression used specifically for dropdown (DDL) UI components; null when not applicable.

columns.name: IsLocation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attribute represents a location (True) or not (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for this attribute value record.

columns.name: ContractProductID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the contract-product context this value belongs to (dbo.ContractProduct.ID).

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the attribute definition for this value (dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition.ID).

columns.name: ProductPartID
columns.description: Foreign key pointing to the specific product part this value is associated with (dbo.ProductPart.ID).

columns.name: Value
columns.description: The stored value for the attribute. Can contain long textual descriptions, URLs or short values; often used as the display/description content.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number that orders multiple values for the same attribute within a product part or contract product.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional migration or import key used for mapping back to source systems; frequently null in current data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source/staging table used in migrations or imports for this value.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional string key from the source system used during migration; commonly null for this dataset.

columns.name: AdvertisementID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing an advertisement record associated with this attribute value (dbo.Advertisement.ID).

columns.name: QA
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this value has passed QA or review (True) or not (False/Null).

columns.name: HeaderLabel
columns.description: Optional short label or header for the value (used when grouping or presenting values under a heading); often null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate numeric identifier for the production color.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly name or description of the color (e.g., Black, Red, Orange).

columns.name: Cyan
columns.description: Cyan component expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used in CMYK color representation.

columns.name: Yellow
columns.description: Yellow component expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used in CMYK color representation.

columns.name: Magenta
columns.description: Magenta component expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used in CMYK color representation.

columns.name: Black
columns.description: Black (Key) component expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used in CMYK color representation.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is currently active and available for use.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is the system/default selection.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate numeric identifier for the production font.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly name or identifier of the font (e.g., UBHelveticaCondeuro).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is currently active and available for selection.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is the default/system font.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the case type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or name of the case type (primary display label).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or business code that identifies the case type (often used for integration or filters).

columns.name: ContextEntityType
columns.description: Optional context/entity type indicating the domain or module this case type applies to (e.g., CAMP, DCC).

columns.name: ContextEntityType2
columns.description: Secondary optional context/entity type; frequently null in the current dataset.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric mapping key to an external data mart or warehouse. Mostly null in current rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data-mart table corresponding to this case type. Often empty.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used to map this case type in an external system or data mart.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the case type definition; used for basic change control.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the case type is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ParentId
columns.description: Optional self-referential parent case type ID used to define hierarchical relationships between case types.

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Free-text or serialized options/configuration for the case type. Often null in the current dataset.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the production workflow.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the production workflow (primary display label).

columns.name: Output
columns.description: Short code or classification indicating the workflow output type or channel (often single-character codes).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the task type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the task type (Greek text values observed).

columns.name: CaseTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the related case type that this task belongs to (links to CaseType.ID).

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Fully-qualified editor view model / class name used to render or edit this task in the client.

columns.name: Outcomes
columns.description: Comma-separated list or encoded values representing possible outcomes produced by this task.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code for the task type (e.g., T01, T02) used for quick identification.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: Single-character activity category code for the task type (business-defined activity classification).

columns.name: TargetCaseTypeID
columns.description: Optional reference to a target case type ID used when this task can create or route to another case type.

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional serialized or delimited options/settings that modify task behavior or parameters.

columns.name: Initiator
columns.description: Fully-qualified class name that indicates what component initiates this task in the workflow engine.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to link to an external data-mart or reporting table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external table used in reporting or data-mart integration.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external data-mart joins or lookups.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the task type is currently active and available for use.

columns.name: OutcomeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression used to compute or evaluate the outcome of the task.

columns.name: Renderings
columns.description: Optional serialized UI rendering information used by the client to present task screens.

columns.name: InVariableExpressions
columns.description: Optional expressions describing input variables required by the task (usually serialized).

columns.name: OutVariableExpressions
columns.description: Optional expressions describing output variables produced by the task (usually serialized).

columns.name: MultiInstance
columns.description: Optional flag indicating whether the task supports multiple concurrent instances.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the task type definition, used for compatibility and migration tracking.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the task type assignment record.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Optional reference to the role permitted or required to perform the task (links to Role.ID).

columns.name: AssignmentType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the assignment mode/type (business-defined enumeration for assignment behaviour).

columns.name: TaskTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the task type this assignment applies to (links to TaskType.ID).

columns.name: SpecialType
columns.description: Optional numeric code indicating a special handling category for the assignment (business-defined).

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional serialized options or parameters that further qualify the assignment (free text or structured string).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for linking assignment records to an external reporting/data-mart table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name used for reporting or data-mart integration related to the assignment.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for joining the assignment to external data sources or reporting artifacts.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket priority (surrogate integer key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the ticket priority (e.g., High, Medium, Low).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external data mapping or legacy integration (often unused in this dataset).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name for data mapping or integration; currently not populated in samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external mapping or legacy references (text). Not populated in sample rows.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this priority is active and available for use.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket type (surrogate integer key).

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Reference to the parent ticket type (self-referential FK to Ticket Type.ID) used for hierarchical categorization.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the ticket type (e.g., category or service name).

columns.name: IsSerial
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this ticket type should be processed in serial order (one at a time).

columns.name: IsParallel
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this ticket type allows parallel processing by multiple handlers.

columns.name: SLA
columns.description: Service level agreement value for this ticket type (numeric; unit depends on implementation). May be null when not defined.

columns.name: NeedsSupervisor
columns.description: Flag indicating whether tickets of this type require supervisor involvement or approval.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for external data mapping or legacy integration (often unused in this dataset).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name used for mapping or integration; typically empty in sample data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key for external mapping or legacy references (text). Not populated in samples.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether this ticket type is active and can be selected when creating tickets.

columns.name: SecretarySupervisorByPass
columns.description: Flag that allows secretary roles to bypass supervisor approval for this ticket type when true.

columns.name: IsEditContractType
columns.description: Indicates if the contract type associated with this ticket type can be edited.

columns.name: IsEditAdvertisementType
columns.description: Indicates if the advertisement type associated with this ticket type can be edited.

columns.name: WebProductType
columns.description: Optional numeric code linking this ticket type to a web product type/category; may be null for most types.

columns.name: CanSellWebChanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether changes of this ticket type can be sold/charged through web channels.

columns.name: IsCampaignLeadIdEditable
columns.description: Optional flag that indicates whether the campaign lead identifier can be edited for this ticket type.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the presale form record.

columns.name: TargetGroupItemValueID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a target group item value (dbo.TargetGroupItemValue.ID). Links this presale form to the target audience/item value.

columns.name: AmountXO
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with 'XO' channel (USD). Many rows are null; used when an XO budget or cost is provided.

columns.name: CommentsXO
columns.description: Free-text comments related to the 'XO' channel. Text content appears in Greek in samples and supplements AmountXO with qualitative details.

columns.name: AmountWebsite
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with website-related spend or valuation (USD). Often null, populated when a website budget or cost is provided.

columns.name: IsAplh
columns.description: Boolean flag (bit). Likely indicates whether the item relates to 'Alpha' classification or a special internal marker; many values are null.

columns.name: IsCatalogProduct
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the product is a catalog product.

columns.name: IsEshop
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the item is sold through an e-shop / online store.

columns.name: MinBudgetPPC
columns.description: Minimum budget suggested for PPC (pay-per-click) campaigns (currency). Nullable; when present indicates the lower bound of PPC budget.

columns.name: MaxBudgetPPC
columns.description: Maximum budget suggested for PPC (pay-per-click) campaigns (currency). Nullable; when present indicates the upper bound of PPC budget.

columns.name: IsInfoSufficientPPC
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the information provided is sufficient for PPC planning/activation.

columns.name: CommentsPPC
columns.description: Free-text comments related to PPC planning. Samples contain Greek-language notes about budgets and campaign requirements; a key human-searchable field.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the unit.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Optional parent identifier for hierarchical unit relationships. Nullable when a unit is at the top level. Multiple foreign-key relationships exist in the source metadata.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the unit. Contains Greek and English values in samples and is the recommended display label for this entity.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the unit record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the record (e.g., DataMigration).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the unit record. Frequently null in the sampled data.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the record. Often null in samples.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the unit is active.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to channel type (dbo.ChannelType.ID). Indicates the type of channel associated with this unit.

columns.name: LeftIndex
columns.description: Left index for nested-set tree structure. Used to represent hierarchical order/position of units.

columns.name: RightIndex
columns.description: Right index for nested-set tree structure. Complements LeftIndex to define the node's subtree boundaries.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by data migration processes. Nullable and varies across migrated rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or staging table used in data migration (e.g., '#units', 'DataMigration'). Helpful for tracing migrated records.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from data migration processes. Currently all sampled values are null.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of all collection amounts (total collected value).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per collection.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest single collection amount in the selected scope.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest single collection amount in the selected scope.

measures.name: CollectionCount
measures.description: Number of collection records (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that had collections in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations) that recorded collections in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct system receipt numbers (useful to detect duplicates or gaps).

recommended_dimensions.lookup_hint: lookup table or mapping required to translate numeric PaymentType to label

measures.name: Contracts
measures.description: Total number of contract records

measures.name: ActiveContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have not been cancelled (CancelledOn is NULL)

measures.name: SubscriptionContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that are subscription-based

measures.name: TotalFinalPrice
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice for the selected contracts. Many rows have NULL FinalPrice — those are excluded from the sum.

measures.name: AverageFinalPrice
measures.description: Average FinalPrice per contract (NULL FinalPrice rows are ignored)

measures.name: TotalUserDiscount
measures.description: Total user-applied discount amounts across contracts

measures.name: AverageUserDiscountAmount
measures.description: Average user discount amount per contract

measures.name: AverageUserDiscountPercent
measures.description: Average user discount percent. Stored as integer/number in source; interpret as percentage (e.g., 10 = 10%).

measures.name: UserDiscountShareOfPrice
measures.description: Share of total discounts relative to total final price (SUM(UserDiscountAmount) / SUM(FinalPrice)). NULL when SUM(FinalPrice)=0 or no price data.

measures.name: TotalUserDiscountPPC
measures.description: Sum of per-product-category (PPC) user discount amounts. Many values are zero or NULL.

measures.name: SignedContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts with a SignedDate (indicates they were signed)

measures.name: PercentSigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of contracts that are signed (SignedDate present) out of total contracts

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract product rows (records)

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented by these contract products

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Total quantity of products across contract product rows

measures.name: TotalGrossAmount
measures.description: Gross amount before discounts (Price multiplied by Quantity, summed)

measures.name: TotalDiscountAmount
measures.description: Sum of all discount fields (explicit discount, rules discount and other discount fields). Nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: TotalNetAmount
measures.expression: SUM((Price * Quantity) - (COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0)))
measures.description: Net amount after subtracting discounts from gross amount

measures.name: AverageUnitPrice
measures.description: Average unit price across contract products

measures.name: AverageDiscountPerUnit
measures.description: Average discount amount per unit (total Discount divided by total Quantity). Returns null when total quantity is zero.

measures.name: AlteredAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount (when present). Useful to track manual adjustments

measures.name: PercentWithAlteredAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of contract product rows that have a non-null AlteredAmount

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as renewed

measures.name: DiscountRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price * Quantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0)) / SUM(Price * Quantity) END
measures.description: Total discounts divided by gross amount — represents the effective discount rate

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Total number of documents (rows). Use as the primary volume measure.

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have one or more documents.

measures.name: DocumentsWithDMCharKey
measures.description: Count of documents that include a DMCharKey (non-null) — indicates linkage to the document management system.

measures.name: PercentWithDMCharKey
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(DMCharKey) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of documents that have a DMCharKey (DM linkage). Calculated as DocumentsWithDMCharKey / DocumentCount.

measures.name: DocumentCountByType
measures.description: Document count intended to be broken down by ContractDocumentType (use ContractDocumentType as a dimension to get per-type counts).

default_filters.description: Exclude orphan records (none expected in this table).

recommended_date.note: CreatedOn can be used for time filters, but data appears historically migrated (many identical timestamps) — validate before relying on for recent trends.

recommendations: Provide a lookup/dimension for ContractDocumentType to translate codes to human-friendly labels.
Trim Filename values and consider extracting file extension/type for filtering (PDF, JPG, etc.).
DMKey and DMTable are empty in the sample; treat DMCharKey as the primary DM linkage if present.

measures.name: Offer Count
measures.description: Total number of contract offer records (one row per offer).

measures.name: Distinct Target Group Item Count
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueID values referenced by offers.

measures.name: Distinct Creators
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created offers.

measures.name: Average Time to Modify (days)
measures.description: Average number of days between CreatedOn and ModifiedOn. If ModifiedOn is null, CreatedOn is used (resulting in 0).

measures.name: Percent Modified After Creation
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL AND ModifiedOn <> CreatedOn THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Proportion of offers that were modified after their creation (ModifiedOn different from CreatedOn).

measures.name: Most Recent Offer CreatedOn
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent offer creation.

measures.name: Earliest Offer CreatedOn
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest offer creation.

foreign_keys.note: inferred relationship — table not listed in original foreign_keys but TargetGroupItemValueID appears to reference a target-group value dimension

display.notes: Use CreatedOn for time-series slicing (year/month). Map CreatedByUserID and ModifiedUserID to the User dimension to display user name/attributes. Consider joining TargetGroupItemValueID to a target-group dimension for descriptive breakdowns.
