measures.name: Total Up-To-Date % (Customers) - stored
measures.description: Stored percentage of total customers up-to-date (averaged).

measures.name: Total Up-To-Date % (Amount) - stored
measures.description: Stored percentage of total amount up-to-date (averaged).

measures.name: KPI ROCO Customers (stored)
measures.description: Stored KPI for ROCO customers; treated as a percentage/rate and averaged across rows. If this KPI is an absolute metric, consider changing unit to numeric.

measures.name: KPI ROCO Amount (stored)
measures.description: Stored KPI for ROCO amount; treated as a percentage/rate and averaged. If it's a monetary KPI, use currency(2).

measures.name: KPI Avg New Customers (stored)
measures.description: Stored KPI representing average (Avo) new customers; averaged across rows. Interpreted as a numeric average.

measures.name: KPI New Conversion Rate (stored)
measures.description: Stored KPI for new conversion rate; averaged across rows.

measures.name: Pct ROCO Target Customers Achieved (computed)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(RocoTargetCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(RocoUpToDateCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(RocoTargetCustomers), 0) END
measures.description: Computed percentage of ROCO target customers achieved = SUM(RocoUpToDateCustomers) / SUM(RocoTargetCustomers). Returns NULL when target is zero.

measures.name: Pct Total Target Amount Achieved (computed)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalTargetAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalUpToDateAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalTargetAmount), 0) END
measures.description: Computed percentage of total target amount achieved = SUM(TotalUpToDateAmount) / SUM(TotalTargetAmount).

measures.name: ROCO Contribution to Achieved Amount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalUpToDateAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(RocoUpToDateAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalUpToDateAmount), 0) END
measures.description: Share of achieved amount coming from ROCO customers = SUM(RocoUpToDateAmount) / SUM(TotalUpToDateAmount).

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Total number of target group items (rows)

measures.name: UniqueCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (by Code) in the target group

measures.name: UniqueBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct brand names represented

measures.name: DistinctMainHeadingCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main heading categories

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items flagged with payment refusal

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items with payment refusal (PaymentRefusal = true)

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items flagged with continuous payment refusal

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items with continuous payment refusal

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items marked as disappeared

measures.name: DisappearedRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items marked as disappeared

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items flagged for legal precariousness

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items flagged for legal precariousness

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items with sealed check flag

measures.name: SealedCheckRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items with sealed check flag

measures.name: HasAddressCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL OR StreetNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items with at least a street name or street number populated

measures.name: AddressCompletenessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL OR StreetNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items that have basic address information (StreetName or StreetNumber)

measures.name: KnownReliabilityCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where a reliability status is provided

measures.name: KnownReliabilityRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of items with a known reliability status

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the fact table

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of target values assigned to the target group item

measures.name: AverageTargetValue
measures.description: Average target value per record

measures.name: TotalChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of channel-level target values

measures.name: AverageChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Average channel-level target value per record

measures.name: TotalUserTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of user-level target values

measures.name: AverageUserTargetValue
measures.description: Average user-level target value per record

measures.name: TotalRequestedDiscountAmount
measures.description: Total requested discount amount (currency)

measures.name: AverageRequestedDiscountAmount
measures.description: Average requested discount amount per record

measures.name: AverageRequestedDiscountPercentage
measures.description: Average requested discount percentage across records

measures.name: TotalFixOfferDiffValue
measures.description: Sum of differences for fixed offers

measures.name: TotalVisits
measures.description: Total visits recorded

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew indicator (aggregated count)

measures.name: AverageLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew value

measures.name: CountReleased
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as released

measures.name: CountClosed
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsClosed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as closed

measures.name: CountNeedPresentation
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedPresentation = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that require a presentation

measures.name: DistinctTargetUsers
measures.description: Count of distinct TargetUserID values represented in the selection

measures.name: LatestLastStatusChange
measures.description: Most recent status change timestamp among the selected records

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (target group item info records)

measures.name: Balance Value
measures.description: Aggregated balance value for the target group item (sum of BalanceValue). Currency assumed USD.

measures.name: Due Balance Value
measures.description: Aggregated due balance value (sum of DueBalanceValue). Currency assumed USD.

measures.name: Settlement Balance Value
measures.description: Aggregated settlement balance value (sum of SettlementBalanceValue). Currency assumed USD.

measures.name: Total PBD Contracts Value (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(ISNULL(Y01PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y02PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y03PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y04PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y05PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y06PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y07PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y08PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y09PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y10PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y11PBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y12PBDContractsValue,0))
measures.description: Row-level total of PBD contract values across year buckets Y01..Y12, aggregated across the result set. Use to understand total printed-business-directory contract value per item.

measures.name: Total PAD Contracts Value (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(ISNULL(Y01PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y02PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y03PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y04PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y05PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y06PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y07PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y08PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y09PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y10PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y11PADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y12PADContractsValue,0))
measures.description: Row-level total of PAD contract values across year buckets Y01..Y12, aggregated across the result set.

measures.name: Total IBD Contracts Value (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(ISNULL(Y01IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y02IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y03IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y04IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y05IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y06IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y07IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y08IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y09IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y10IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y11IBDContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y12IBDContractsValue,0))
measures.description: Row-level total of IBD contract values across year buckets Y01..Y12, aggregated across the result set.

measures.name: Total IAD Contracts Value (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(ISNULL(Y01IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y02IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y03IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y04IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y05IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y06IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y07IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y08IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y09IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y10IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y11IADContractsValue,0) + ISNULL(Y12IADContractsValue,0))
measures.description: Row-level total of IAD contract values across year buckets Y01..Y12, aggregated across the result set.

measures.name: Expiration Value (Internet)
measures.description: Sum of expiration-related internet values (ExpirationValueInternet).

measures.name: Subscription Value
measures.description: Sum of subscription values associated with the target group item.

measures.name: Total Preprinted Value
measures.description: Sum of TotalPreprintedValue. This appears to be a monetary total for preprinted assets (currency assumed USD).

measures.name: Y01 Entries
measures.description: Sum of entries in bucket Y01 (count). Useful for understanding entry volumes in this year/bucket.

measures.name: Y02 Entries
measures.description: Sum of entries in bucket Y02 (count).

measures.name: Y01 Directories Sections
measures.description: Sum of directories sections in bucket Y01 (count).

measures.name: Y02 Directories Sections
measures.description: Sum of directories sections in bucket Y02 (count).

measures.name: Cancel Amount
measures.description: Sum of cancellation amounts. Currency hint in source metadata indicates USD.

measures.name: Credit Invoice Value
measures.description: Sum of credit invoice values (if present).

measures.name: Exchange Sale Value
measures.description: Sum of values for exchange sales.

measures.name: Has Online Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasOnline = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where HasOnline is true.

measures.name: Has Graphic File Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasGraphicFile = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where HasGraphicFile is true.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of records at the fact grain (ID).

measures.name: Distinct Target Group Item Values
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueID represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: Distinct Contract Products
measures.description: Number of distinct ContractProductID represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: Average Period
measures.description: Average of the Period values (Period appears to be a monthly or period index). Useful for summarizing the typical period across the scoped records.

measures.name: Minimum Period
measures.description: Minimum Period value in the selected scope.

measures.name: Maximum Period
measures.description: Maximum Period value in the selected scope.

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) represented in this fact table.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Sum of installments across payment methods. (Installments is an integer; null-rate 0%).

measures.name: AverageInstallmentsPerMethod
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment method.

measures.name: AverageInterval
measures.description: Average interval value between payments. Small number of distinct values (2) — useful to detect payment cadence.

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with these payment method records.

measures.name: AverageInvoicesPerMethod
measures.description: Average number of invoices per payment method record.

measures.name: PreInvoiceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method rows marked as pre-invoice (PreInvoice = true).

measures.name: ExchangeSaleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method rows flagged as exchange sales.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptNumbers
measures.description: Distinct count of system receipt numbers referenced by these payment methods. Note: high null rate (~96%).

measures.name: PaymentMethodsWithCreditCard
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardTypeID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods that reference a credit card type (CreditCardTypeID is populated). Note: Credit card fields are sparsely populated.

measures.name: AdvancedPolicyAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of advanced policy amounts attached to the payment method. Column is DECIMAL(18,3). Note: current sample indicates this column is entirely null / not populated.

default_filters.description: Hide records with no payment month by default to focus on dated payments.

measures.name: Link Count
measures.description: Number of association rows. Each row represents one link between an InvoicePaymentMethod and a SalesCollection.

measures.name: Distinct Sales Collection Count
measures.description: The number of unique SalesCollection IDs represented in the current query context.

measures.name: Distinct Invoice Payment Method Count
measures.description: The number of unique InvoicePaymentMethod IDs represented in the current query context.

measures.name: PolicyCount
measures.description: Number of distinct invoice policy records (one row per policy ID).

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices scheduled across all policies (sum of NumberOfInvoices).

measures.name: AvgInvoicesPerPolicy
measures.description: Average number of invoices per policy.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Total number of installments across all policies.

measures.name: AvgInstallmentsPerPolicy
measures.description: Average number of installments per policy.

measures.name: AvgInterval
measures.description: Average interval value for policies. Interpretation depends on business meaning of the Interval column.

measures.name: AvgPriceFrom
measures.description: Average lower bound of the policy price range (PriceFrom). Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: AvgPriceTo
measures.description: Average upper bound of the policy price range (PriceTo). Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: AvgPriceRange
measures.description: Average difference between PriceTo and PriceFrom (PriceTo - PriceFrom). Only policies where both PriceFrom and PriceTo are present are included; nulls reduce the effective sample.

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Minimum PriceFrom value observed (ignores nulls).

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Maximum PriceTo value observed (ignores nulls).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types referenced by these policies.

measures.name: AvgPolicyDurationDays
measures.description: Average policy duration in days computed as EndDate - StartDate. Policies with missing StartDate or EndDate are excluded; many rows have null dates.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the buffer.

measures.name: TotalCollectedAmount
measures.description: Sum of collected amounts on receipts.

measures.name: AverageReceiptAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as a payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: CreditCardPaymentCount
measures.description: Number of receipts that have a credit card type recorded (non-null CreditCardTypeID).

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments for receipts with credit card installment information. High null rate — only applies where CreditCardInstallments is present.

measures.name: BankDepositedAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositDate IS NOT NULL THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts that have a bank deposit date (i.e., amounts that have been deposited).

measures.name: LineCount
measures.description: Number of contract lines (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: TotalNetAmount
measures.description: Sum of NetAmount for contract lines. Represents the net monetary value for lines (pre-tax / pre-adjustment) as recorded in ERP.

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total advanced payments applied to the contract lines.

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount (adjustments). Note: this column is almost entirely null in source data, may be zero/empty for most rows.

measures.name: TotalInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with the contract lines (sum of InvoiceQuantity).

measures.name: AvgInstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average number of installments per invoice for the selected contract lines.

measures.name: MaxInstallmentSequence
measures.description: Maximum installment sequence number observed for the selected contract lines (useful to identify latest/last installment position).

measures.name: AvgNetAmountPerInvoice
measures.description: Average net amount per invoice for the contract lines. Computed as TotalNetAmount divided by TotalInvoiceQuantity; NULL when InvoiceQuantity sums to zero.

measures.name: Salesman Count
measures.description: Total number of rows (distinct salesmen) in the buffer.

measures.name: Active Salesman Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of salesmen marked as active (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: Active Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of salesmen that are active (Active Salesman Count / Salesman Count).

measures.name: Mapped to Dimension Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of buffer rows that have been linked to a dimension record (DMKey or DMCharKey populated).

measures.name: Most Recent LastModified
measures.description: Latest LastModifiedDate across all buffer records — indicates the most recent change.

measures.name: Oldest LastModified
measures.description: Earliest LastModifiedDate in the buffer — useful to detect very stale rows.

measures.name: Days Since Most Recent Modification
measures.description: Number of days since the most recent LastModifiedDate (recency metric).

foreign_keys.description: Logical reference to the salesmen dimension (recommended). Actual FK not enforced in source.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of task records (one row per task).

measures.name: Completed Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn).

measures.name: Open Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that are not completed (no CompletedOn).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (Completed Tasks / Task Count).

measures.name: Average Days to Complete
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND CreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time between task creation and completion, expressed in days (fractional).

measures.name: Unique Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by these tasks.

measures.name: Average Tasks per Case
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of tasks associated with each case.

measures.name: LogCount
measures.description: Number of task log entries (rows) in the selected scope

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks referenced by these log entries

measures.name: MinTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest recorded timestamp for log entries in the selected scope

measures.name: MaxTimestamp
measures.description: Latest recorded timestamp for log entries in the selected scope

measures.name: AvgLogsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of log entries per distinct task (null when no tasks)

measures.name: OutcomeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Outcome) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log entries with a non-empty Outcome value

measures.name: OutcomeRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Outcome) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of log entries that have an Outcome recorded

measures.name: DistinctOutcomeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Outcome values observed (including placeholders like 'None' if present)

measures.name: TextCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Text) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log entries that include non-empty Text (notes/details)

measures.name: Actions_Total
measures.description: Total number of action log entries (events).

measures.name: Distinct_Tasks_Touched
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one action recorded in the log.

measures.name: Actions_per_Task_Average
measures.description: Average number of actions per distinct task (total actions divided by distinct tasks). NULL when there are no tasks.

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Most recent action timestamp in the aggregation window.

measures.name: Action_Type_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions where Action = 1. Action code mapping is not provided; interpret according to your domain (e.g., 1 = Completed).

measures.name: Action_Type_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions where Action = 2. Action code mapping is not provided; interpret according to your domain.

measures.name: Action_Type_1_Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of total actions that are of type Action = 1 (as a ratio). NULL when there are no actions.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of task assignment records.

measures.name: Distinct Tasks Assigned
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have one or more assignments.

measures.name: Distinct Users Assigned
measures.description: Number of distinct users referenced on assignments (null values are ignored).

measures.name: Primary Assignments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments marked as primary (AssignmentType = 1).

measures.name: Avg Assignments per Task
measures.description: Average number of assignment records per task.

measures.name: Distinct DMKey Count
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values (useful for linking to the downstream DMTable).

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Number of tickets (one row per ticket).

measures.name: Completed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a completion date (tickets considered completed).

measures.name: Completed Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tickets that have been completed (Completed Count / Ticket Count).

measures.name: Average Days to Complete
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between ticket creation and completion. Tickets without CompletedOn are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Total Credit Amount
measures.description: Sum of CreditAmount on tickets. Note: this column is mostly null in the current sample.

measures.name: Total Cancel Amount
measures.description: Sum of CancelAmount on tickets (amounts credited/cancelled). Note: this column is mostly null in the current sample.

measures.name: Needs Evaluation Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as needing evaluation.

measures.name: Needs Supervisor Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that require supervisor attention.

measures.name: Unresolved Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets not yet completed.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of ticket-task result records

measures.name: CompletedResults
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of task results flagged as completed/successful (Result = 1)

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of task results that are completed/successful

measures.name: PendingReviewCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingReview = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of task results currently marked as pending review

measures.name: CustomerConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of task results confirmed by the customer (ResultCustomer = 1)

measures.name: CommunicationRecordedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of task results that have a communication recorded (ResultComm = 1)

measures.name: PerformedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PerformedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of task results that have a PerformedOn timestamp (i.e., an action was performed)

measures.name: DistinctTicketCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in this set of results

measures.name: AvgTasksPerTicket
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(*) / COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID) END
measures.description: Average number of task results per ticket

measures.name: TotalCalls
measures.description: Total number of click-to-call records (each row is a call attempt or click)

measures.name: UniquePhones
measures.description: Number of distinct phone numbers contacted

measures.name: UniqueUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who initiated calls

measures.name: UniqueTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with calls

measures.name: UniqueTargetGroupItems
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValue entries referenced by calls

measures.name: CallsWithKSCallIdentifier
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KSCallIdentifier IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a non-null KSCallIdentifier

measures.name: PercentWithKSCallIdentifier
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KSCallIdentifier IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of calls that include a KSCallIdentifier

measures.name: AverageCallsPerUser
measures.description: Average number of call attempts per user over the aggregation window

measures.name: FirstCallTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest call timestamp in the aggregation window

measures.name: LastCallTimestamp
measures.description: Latest call timestamp in the aggregation window

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Total number of dialer task records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItemCount
measures.description: Number of distinct target group item values represented in the task set.

measures.name: PendingImportCount
measures.description: Count of tasks marked as pending import.

measures.name: PermitCallCount
measures.description: Count of tasks where calling is permitted.

measures.name: RequiresSynchronizationCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that require synchronization.

measures.name: NotFoundCount
measures.description: Sum of the NotFound field. Typically represents number of not-found occurrences (column appears to be binary/flag).

measures.name: NotFoundRate
measures.description: Proportion of tasks flagged as not found (NotFound / total tasks). Returns NULL when there are no rows.

measures.name: DistinctProcessCount
measures.description: Number of distinct processes (ProcessID) associated with tasks in the result set.

measures.name: CallCount
measures.description: Number of dialer log entries (calls/operations) in the set.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all logged operations.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAverage
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per logged operation.

measures.name: DistinctStatusCount
measures.description: Number of distinct status codes observed in the selected logs.

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds
measures.description: Average elapsed time in seconds between the logged Timestamp and CompletedOn.

measures.name: MinDurationSeconds
measures.description: Minimum elapsed time in seconds between Timestamp and CompletedOn.

measures.name: MaxDurationSeconds
measures.description: Maximum elapsed time in seconds between Timestamp and CompletedOn.

default_filters.description: Default to the last 90 days of logs

measures.name: RunCount
measures.description: Total number of batch run records (row count).

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have a non-null CompletedOn timestamp (i.e., completed runs).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of runs that are completed (CompletedCount / RunCount).

measures.name: AverageCompletionHours
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND ScheduledOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) / 3600.0 END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in hours from ScheduledOn to CompletedOn for runs that have both timestamps.

measures.name: Status_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 0. (Status codes are stored as integers; interpret codes via business dictionary.)

measures.name: Status_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 2. (Status codes are stored as integers; interpret codes via business dictionary.)

measures.name: Status_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 3. (Status codes are stored as integers; interpret codes via business dictionary.)

measures.name: ExplicitPriorityCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Priority IS NOT NULL AND Priority <> 2147483647 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs with an explicit (non-default) Priority value. Note: 2147483647 appears in the data as a sentinel/default value.

measures.name: DefaultPriorityCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Priority = 2147483647 OR Priority IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have the default/sentinel Priority (2147483647) or no priority set.

measures.name: BatchCount
measures.description: Total number of batch search definitions (row count).

measures.name: DistinctBatchNames
measures.description: Number of distinct batch search names.

measures.name: ActiveBatches
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches marked active (Status = 1).

measures.name: InactiveBatches
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches marked inactive (Status = 0).

measures.name: ScheduledExecutionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches configured for scheduled execution (ExecutionType = 1).

measures.name: ManualExecutionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches configured for manual execution (ExecutionType = 0).

measures.name: PercentageScheduledExecution
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of batches configured for scheduled execution (Scheduled / Total). NULL when there are no rows.

measures.name: TotalTimes
measures.description: Sum of Times values across batches. Note: Times is sparsely populated; NULLs are ignored by the aggregate.

measures.name: AverageTimes
measures.description: Average of Times (ignores NULLs). Because Times is mostly NULL in the sample, interpret averages carefully.

measures.name: TotalFrequence
measures.description: Sum of Frequence values across batches. Frequence is sparsely populated; NULLs are ignored.

measures.name: AverageFrequence
measures.description: Average Frequence (ignores NULLs). Sparse values mean averages may be based on few rows.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Number of recorded batch actions (rows in this table)

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more actions recorded

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all batch actions

measures.name: RowsAffectedAverage
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action

measures.name: RowsAffectedMax
measures.description: Maximum rows affected in a single batch action

measures.name: RowsAffectedMin
measures.description: Minimum rows affected in a single batch action (may be 0)

measures.name: CompletedActions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions flagged as completed/successful (Status = 1)

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of actions that are completed/successful (Status = 1)

measures.name: DistinctActionTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchActionType values present in the filtered set

foreign_keys.description: Links the action to the batch entity (suggested dimension)
Suggested mapping to a date/time dimension for time-based analysis
Suggested lookup/dimension for action type semantics
Suggested lookup/dimension for action status (e.g., success/failure)
Suggested lookup/dimension for the action Type classification

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of action history records in the current query context.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Number of actions in the current grouping (useful when grouping by BatchID).

measures.name: DistinctEntityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct entities referenced in the current query context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches present in the current query context.

measures.name: DistinctTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct action Type codes observed.

measures.name: HasEntityDataCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that carry non-null EntityData XML payloads.

measures.name: PercentWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that contain EntityData (EntityData IS NOT NULL) in the current context.

measures.name: RepresentativeEntityType
measures.description: Representative entity type value for the current grouping. This source contains a single EntityType value across rows, so MAX returns that constant.

display.notes: Use BatchID and Type as primary dimensions for analysis (Type presents a small set of action codes). EntityData is an XML payload — parse into a dimension table before heavy use.

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Total number of cases (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Initiators
measures.description: Number of distinct initiator users who created cases.

measures.name: Completed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have a CompletedOn timestamp (i.e., completed cases).

measures.name: Open Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)*1.0/COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of cases that are completed (Completed Count / Case Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Completion (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn)/3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average duration in hours between CreatedOn and CompletedOn for completed cases.

measures.name: Average Age of Open Cases (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)/86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average age in days of cases that are still open (calculated from CreatedOn to now).

measures.name: Distinct Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (PointCode) referenced by cases.

measures.name: AttachmentCount
measures.description: Total number of attachment records.

measures.name: ActiveAttachmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments not marked as deleted (IsDeleted = false).

measures.name: DeletedAttachmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments marked as deleted (IsDeleted = true).

measures.name: LastVersionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsLast = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments flagged as the last (IsLast = true).

measures.name: DistinctDisplayNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct display names for attachments (useful to detect duplicates or different versions).

measures.name: MetadataPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Metadata IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments that have non-null Metadata.

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest creation timestamp for attachments in the aggregated set.

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent creation timestamp for attachments in the aggregated set.

notes: AttachmentType is stored as an integer (distinct_count=2); treat as a small enumerated dimension when available.
Consider breaking down attachment counts by AttachmentType and CaseAttachmentTypeID to get distribution of file types.
Default filter excludes deleted rows; remove filter to include deleted attachments in analyses.

measures.name: TotalComments
measures.description: Total number of comments (rows) in the CaseComment table

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have at least one comment

measures.name: CommentsLinkedToTask
measures.description: Count of comments that are linked to a Task (TaskID is not null)

measures.name: PercentCommentsLinkedToTask
measures.description: Share of comments that are linked to a task (CommentsLinkedToTask / TotalComments)

measures.name: TotalCharacters
measures.description: Total number of characters across all comment texts (useful for text-volume analysis)

measures.name: AverageCommentLength
measures.description: Average number of characters per comment

measures.name: CommentType_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CommentType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of comments with CommentType = 0 (present in current data sample)

measures.name: Recent30DaysComments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of comments created in the last 30 days (relative to query runtime)

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of product-to-case records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: Distinct Pricelist Items
measures.description: Number of distinct pricelist items referenced by the production case products.

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have associated production products.

measures.name: Average Products per Case
measures.expression: CASE WHEN DISTINCTCOUNT(CaseID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(ID) / DISTINCTCOUNT(CaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of product lines associated with each case (total rows divided by distinct cases).

measures.name: Non-Null DMKey Count
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-null DMKey (rows with data-mart key populated).

measures.name: Distinct DMTable Values
measures.description: Number of distinct DMTable values appearing on production case product rows (useful for understanding source/table attribution).

measures.name: Total Working Days
measures.description: Total working days logged for the salesperson during the campaign period.

measures.name: Total Visits
measures.description: Total number of visits (including fractional/weighted visits) recorded for the salesperson in the campaign.

measures.name: CO Visits
measures.description: Count of 'CO' type visits for the salesperson (as recorded by the source).

measures.name: New Visits
measures.description: Number of visits classified as new during the campaign.

measures.name: CO Customers
measures.description: Number of customers associated with 'CO' visits.

measures.name: CO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with 'CO' customers/visits.

measures.name: Loss Customers
measures.description: Number of customers lost during the campaign period.

measures.name: Loss Amount
measures.description: Monetary value lost as a result of lost customers.

measures.name: Increase Customers
measures.description: Number of customers gained (increase) during the campaign period.

measures.name: Increase Amount
measures.description: Monetary value associated with the increase in customers.

measures.name: Reduction Customers
measures.description: Number of customers with reduced value/engagement.

measures.name: Reduction Amount
measures.description: Monetary reduction associated with customers who decreased activity or spend.

measures.name: No Changes Customers
measures.description: Number of customers whose status/value did not change during the campaign.

measures.name: No Changes Amount
measures.description: Monetary value associated with customers with no change.

measures.name: ROCO Customers
measures.description: Number of customers classified as ROCO (re-onboarded/returned or a domain-specific ROCO category).

measures.name: ROCO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with ROCO customers.

measures.name: New Customers
measures.description: Number of newly acquired customers during the campaign.

measures.name: New Amount
measures.description: Monetary value associated with newly acquired customers.

measures.name: Total Customers
measures.description: Total customers attributed to the salesperson for the campaign period.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Total monetary amount (sales/value) attributed to the salesperson for the campaign period.

measures.name: Average Amount per Customer
measures.description: Average monetary amount per customer (Total Amount divided by Total Customers). Protects against division by zero.

measures.name: Visits per Working Day
measures.description: Average number of visits per working day for the salesperson (Total Visits divided by Total Working Days).

measures.name: New Customer Rate
measures.description: Proportion of customers that are new (New Customers divided by Total Customers).

measures.name: Loss Customer Rate
measures.description: Proportion of customers lost (Loss Customers divided by Total Customers).

measures.name: Net Customer Change
measures.description: Net change in customer count (increases minus losses) during the campaign.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of history records in the table (including deleted records).

measures.name: Active Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of non-deleted (active) history records.

measures.name: Deleted Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as deleted.

measures.name: Deleted Share
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of records that are marked as deleted (0-1).

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen referenced in the history.

measures.name: Distinct Supervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors referenced in the history.

measures.name: Distinct Managers
measures.description: Number of distinct managers referenced in the history.

measures.name: Distinct Segments
measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the table.

measures.name: First CreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp for records in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: Last CreatedOn
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp for records in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: Policy Count
measures.description: Number of payment policy records (row count).

measures.name: Average UDAC Characterization
measures.description: Average value of the UdacCharacterization code across policies. Useful as a summary statistic; the field appears to be a small categorical/integer classification.

measures.name: Distinct UDAC Characterizations
measures.description: Number of distinct UDAC characterization values found in the policy set.

measures.name: Minimum Price From
measures.description: Lowest PriceFrom value (lower bound of price range) among policies. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Maximum Price From
measures.description: Highest PriceFrom value (lower bound of price range) among policies. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Average Price From
measures.description: Average of PriceFrom values where defined; helpful to understand typical lower price thresholds for policies.

measures.name: Minimum Price To
measures.description: Lowest PriceTo value (upper bound of price range) among policies. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Maximum Price To
measures.description: Highest PriceTo value (upper bound of price range) among policies. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Average Price To
measures.description: Average of PriceTo values where defined; helpful to understand typical upper price thresholds for policies.

measures.name: Total Number Of Invoices (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the NumberOfInvoices field across policies. Represents total invoice counts implied by policies.

measures.name: Average Number Of Invoices
measures.description: Average number of invoices per policy.

measures.name: Total Installments (sum)
measures.description: Sum of installments across policies (aggregate of the Installments field).

measures.name: Average Installments
measures.description: Average number of installments per policy.

measures.name: Distinct Intervals
measures.description: Number of distinct interval values present in the policy set.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of discount policy items (row count).

measures.name: DistinctPolicyCount
measures.description: Number of distinct discount policies referenced by these items.

measures.name: SumAmount
measures.description: Total absolute discount amount across items (stored in Amount column).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average absolute discount amount per item.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum absolute discount amount among items.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum absolute discount amount among items.

measures.name: MinRangeDownLimit
measures.description: Minimum lower bound of the quantity/value range for discount applicability.

measures.name: AvgRangeDownLimit
measures.description: Average lower bound of the range across items.

measures.name: MaxRangeDownLimit
measures.description: Maximum lower bound of the range for discount applicability.

measures.name: MinRangeUpLimit
measures.description: Minimum upper bound of the quantity/value range for discount applicability.

measures.name: AvgRangeUpLimit
measures.description: Average upper bound of the range across items.

measures.name: MaxRangeUpLimit
measures.description: Maximum upper bound of the range for discount applicability.

measures.name: EnabledLimitCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ISNULL(EnableLimit,0) <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where EnableLimit is set (non-zero). Useful to determine how many items enforce a limit.

measures.name: SumEnableLimit
measures.description: Sum of EnableLimit values (interpretation depends on how EnableLimit is used in business logic).

measures.name: MinPercentage
measures.description: Minimum percentage specified in items. Stored as integer percent points (e.g., 10 = 10%).

measures.name: AvgPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage across items. Values stored as integer percent points (e.g., 10 = 10%).

measures.name: MaxPercentage
measures.description: Maximum percentage specified in items.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of Udac rows

measures.name: Distinct Udac Count
measures.description: Count of distinct Udac identifiers (should equal Row Count if ID is unique)

measures.name: Average MinMembers
measures.description: Average of the MinMembers value where defined

measures.name: Min of MinMembers
measures.description: Minimum configured MinMembers

measures.name: Max of MaxMembers
measures.description: Maximum configured MaxMembers

measures.name: Average MaxMembers
measures.description: Average of the MaxMembers value where defined

measures.name: Sum MaxAllowedChanges
measures.description: Total of MaxAllowedChanges across all Udacs (often zero in this dataset)

measures.name: Distinct Udac Types
measures.description: Number of distinct values in UdacType

measures.name: Distinct Characterizations
measures.description: Number of distinct characterization codes

measures.name: Count with NewUdacID
measures.description: Number of rows that reference a NewUdacID (non-null)

measures.name: Distinct NewUdacIDs
measures.description: Number of distinct referenced NewUdac IDs

measures.name: IsComposite Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs marked as composite

measures.name: IsComposite Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of Udacs marked as composite

measures.name: HasOptionalMembers Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasOptionalMembers = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs that have optional members

measures.name: IsDeleted Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs flagged as deleted

measures.name: IsDeleted Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of Udacs flagged as deleted

measures.name: HasPriceRanges Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasPriceRanges = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs that have price ranges

measures.name: CanBeSubscribed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CanBeSubscribed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs that can be subscribed

measures.name: IsDirProduct Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDirProduct = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of Udacs flagged as direct products

measures.name: CreatedOn Earliest
measures.description: Earliest creation timestamp for Udacs

measures.name: CreatedOn Latest
measures.description: Most recent creation timestamp for Udacs

measures.name: ModifiedOn Latest
measures.description: Most recent modification timestamp for Udacs (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the UdacPart table (one row per part instance).

measures.name: Distinct Part Definitions
measures.description: Number of distinct Udac part definitions referenced by these rows.

measures.name: Distinct Udacs
measures.description: Number of distinct Udac entities referenced by these part rows.

measures.name: Total Minimum Occurrence
measures.description: Sum of MinOccurence across all parts (treats NULL as 0).

measures.name: Average Minimum Occurrence
measures.description: Average of MinOccurence for parts (NULLs ignored).

measures.name: Total Maximum Occurrence
measures.description: Sum of MaxOccurence across all parts (treats NULL as 0).

measures.name: Average Maximum Occurrence
measures.description: Average of MaxOccurence for parts (NULLs ignored).

measures.name: Maximum Allowed Occurrence (max of MaxOccurence)
measures.description: Maximum value observed in MaxOccurence (highest allowed occurrences for any part).

measures.name: Addon Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of parts marked as addons (IsAddon = true).

measures.name: Non-Addon Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of parts not marked as addons.

measures.name: Addon Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of parts that are addons (Addon Count / Row Count).

measures.name: Min FillOrder
measures.description: Lowest FillOrder value present (helps understand ordering constraints).

measures.name: Max FillOrder
measures.description: Highest FillOrder value present.

measures.name: Average FillOrder
measures.description: Average FillOrder value (NULLs ignored).

measures.name: Distinct Price Modes
measures.description: Number of distinct PriceMode values present (useful because PriceMode is often NULL or constant).

measures.name: PriceMode = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceMode = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where PriceMode = 0 (useful if 0 is the default/primary pricing mode).

measures.name: TotalMinOccurrence
measures.description: Sum of the minimum required occurrences for the product parts in the selected scope. Use this to understand the minimum total quantity required when parts are aggregated across products.

measures.name: TotalMaxOccurrence
measures.description: Sum of the maximum allowed occurrences for the product parts in the selected scope. Useful to estimate the upper bound total quantity if all parts are taken at their maximum.

measures.name: AverageMaxOccurrence
measures.description: Average of the maximum allowed occurrences per product part. Helps summarize how permissive part multiplicity typically is.

measures.name: DistinctPriceModeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct PriceMode values present in the filtered set. PriceMode is typically a small enumerated set indicating how price is applied for the part.

measures.name: AverageFillOrder
measures.description: Average FillOrder value used for ordering/positioning parts. Lower numbers typically indicate higher priority placement.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the ProductKit table (each row represents one product membership in a kit).

measures.name: MemberCount
measures.description: Count of MemberID values (number of membership entries). Use when counting membership rows in a given filter context.

measures.name: DistinctKitCount
measures.description: Number of distinct kits represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctMemberCount
measures.description: Number of distinct member products represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: MandatoryMemberCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of members marked as mandatory in kits.

measures.name: OptionalMemberCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of members marked as optional (non-mandatory) in kits.

measures.name: MaxFillOrder
measures.description: Maximum FillOrder value for the current context. FillOrder appears constant in samples but is included for completeness.

measures.name: AvgFillOrder
measures.description: Average FillOrder for the current context. Useful if FillOrder varies across rows.

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of price range rows (rows in this table).

measures.name: DistinctPriceListItemCount
measures.description: Number of distinct price list item detail records represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Lowest starting price (PriceFrom) across matched ranges.

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Highest upper bound price (PriceTo) across matched ranges. NULL values are ignored.

measures.name: AvgPriceFrom
measures.description: Average of the starting prices (PriceFrom).

measures.name: AvgPriceTo
measures.description: Average of the upper-bound prices (PriceTo). NULL values are excluded from the average.

measures.name: EstimatedMidpointPrice
measures.description: Estimated midpoint price for ranges. For ranges with a null PriceTo the PriceFrom value is used as the midpoint.

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of OneTimeAmount across selected ranges.

measures.name: AvgOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Average one-time amount associated with the price ranges.

measures.name: AvgExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Average extra fee expressed as a percentage applied for the ranges.

measures.name: MaxExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Maximum extra fee percentage observed across the selected ranges.

measures.name: Campaign Count
measures.description: Number of campaigns (rows) in the selected set

measures.name: Active Campaigns (not closed or cancelled)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL AND CancelledOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of campaigns that are not closed and not cancelled

measures.name: Requires Targeting Recalculation Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresTargetingRecalculation = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns flagged as requiring targeting recalculation

measures.name: Total Target Group Items
measures.description: Sum of TargetGroupItemNumber across campaigns (zeros for nulls)

measures.name: Distinct DMKey Count
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values present for the selected campaigns

measures.name: Average Percent Improvement / Deterioration
measures.description: Average of the PercentImprovementDeterioration metric (where populated). Interpret as a percentage when values are stored as fractional percent or percent points.

measures.name: Printed Target (Sum)
measures.description: Sum of PrintedTarget across campaigns (useful for understanding planned/printed volumes)

measures.name: Average Actual Duration (days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartedOn and ClosedOn for campaigns that have both dates

measures.name: Average Planned Duration (days)
measures.description: Average planned duration in days between PlannedStartOn and PlannedCloseOn (ignores nulls)

measures.name: Bucket Count
measures.description: Number of campaign buckets (rows) — use to count distinct buckets or as denominator for rates.

measures.name: Total Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount across buckets. Represents total planned/assigned spend for the bucket.

measures.name: Total Amount (avg)
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per bucket.

measures.name: XO.gr Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount (XO.gr) across buckets.

measures.name: PPC Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount (pay-per-click) across buckets.

measures.name: Website Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount across buckets.

measures.name: Print Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount across buckets (mostly null in sample).

measures.name: Targeting Amount (calculated) (sum)
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amount for buckets.

measures.name: Targeting Amount (by user) (sum)
measures.description: Sum of user-provided targeting amounts (sparse).

measures.name: Average Score Total
measures.description: Average combined score (ScoreTotal) across buckets — useful to track average campaign quality/rating.

measures.name: Max Score Total
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal observed in the selected buckets.

measures.name: Average Score Main Activity
measures.description: Average score for main activity component.

measures.name: Average Score Seniority
measures.description: Average seniority score component.

measures.name: Average Score Value Billing Range
measures.description: Average score for the billing range value component.

measures.name: Average Score Combination Medium
measures.description: Average score for medium combination component.

measures.name: Average Score Combination Product
measures.description: Average score for product combination component.

measures.name: Average Score Customer Behavior
measures.description: Average score for customer behavior component.

measures.name: Average Score Salesman Management
measures.description: Average score for salesman management component.

measures.name: Average Score Difference To Avg
measures.description: Average difference of bucket score to campaign average (positive = above avg).

measures.name: Active Bucket Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ItemStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets with ItemStatus = 1 (active).

measures.name: Working Bucket Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets with WorkingStatus = 1.

measures.name: Buckets by Characterization (sum-flag)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Characterization IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets that have a Characterization value assigned.

measures.name: SegmentCount
measures.description: Number of campaign segment rows.

measures.name: IncludedQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of IncludedQuantity across segments.

measures.name: ExcludedQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of ExcludedQuantity across segments.

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of IncludedOthersQuantity (nullable) across segments.

measures.name: SecondIncludedQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of SecondIncludedQuantity across segments (secondary include set).

measures.name: SecondExcludedQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of SecondExcludedQuantity across segments (secondary exclude set).

measures.name: TotalQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of TotalQuantity across segments (primary total).

measures.name: SecondTotalQuantitySum
measures.description: Total of SecondTotalQuantity across segments (secondary total).

measures.name: WorkingDaysSum
measures.description: Sum of WorkingDays for segments (total working-days allocated).

measures.name: WorkingDaysAvg
measures.description: Average WorkingDays per segment.

measures.name: IncludedPercentOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity)*1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of included quantity versus total quantity (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: ExcludedPercentOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity)*1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of excluded quantity versus total quantity (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: FinalizedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of segments that have been finalized (FinalizedOn is not null).

measures.name: NotFinalizedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of segments not yet finalized (FinalizedOn is null).

measures.name: AssignedFromPreviousPeriodCount
measures.description: Count of segments where AssignmentSalesmanSupervisorFromPreviousPeriod flag is set.

measures.name: SplitSalesmanSegmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SplitSalesmanSegment = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of segments where SplitSalesmanSegment flag is set.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of campaign–salesman assignment rows in the current filter context (each row represents one salesman assigned to one campaign).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmanCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: Request Count
measures.description: Total number of campaign assignment requests (one row = one request).

measures.name: Open Requests
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that are still open (no ClosedOn timestamp).

measures.name: Closed Requests
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that have been closed (have a ClosedOn timestamp).

measures.name: Percent Closed
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of requests that have been closed (Closed Requests / Request Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Close (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, ClosedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from CreatedOn to ClosedOn for closed requests, expressed in days (fractional).

measures.name: Distinct Requesters
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created requests in the selected set.

measures.name: Unassigned Requests
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PerformerID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests with no assigned performer.

measures.name: Percent Unassigned
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN PerformerID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of requests that are not assigned to any performer (Unassigned Requests / Request Count).

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of assignment detail rows (each row represents a single bucket assignment in a request).

measures.name: NewSalesmanAssignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment rows where a new salesman was assigned (NewSalesmanID is not null).

measures.name: ChangedSalesmanCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL AND NewSalesmanID <> OldSalesmanID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment rows where the assigned salesman changed (NewSalesmanID present and different from OldSalesmanID).

measures.name: ChangedSalesmanPct
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL AND NewSalesmanID <> OldSalesmanID THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of assignment rows that resulted in a different salesman being assigned (value between 0 and 1; display as percentage).

measures.name: NewSegmentAssignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment rows where a new segment was specified (NewSegmentID is not null).

measures.name: ChangedSegmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL AND NewSegmentID <> OldSegmentID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment rows where the segment changed (NewSegmentID present and different from OldSegmentID).

measures.name: AnyAssignmentChangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL AND NewSalesmanID <> OldSalesmanID) OR (NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL AND NewSegmentID <> OldSegmentID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment rows where either the salesman or the segment changed.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaigns represented in the selected assignment rows.

measures.name: DistinctBucketCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaign buckets represented in the selected assignment rows.

measures.name: DistinctOldSalesmenCount
measures.description: Count of distinct original salesmen referenced in the assignment rows.

measures.name: DistinctNewSalesmenCount
measures.description: Count of distinct newly assigned salesmen (nulls excluded).
